mapper.select: select * from faq order by reg_date DESC, faq_no DESC LIMIT 10
select * from faq WHERE (reg_date < #{reg_date} OR (reg_date = #{reg_date} AND faq_no < #{faq_no})) order by reg_date DESC, faq_no DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: insert into faq(question, answer, img, reg_date) VALUES (#{question}, #{answer}, #{img}, #{reg_date})
mapper.update: update faq SET question=#{question}, answer=#{answer}, img=#{img} WHERE faq_no=#{faq_no}
